message: I'm offering you a rare opportunity to acquire a high-quality product worth $30000. I'm confident in its quality and I'm willing to sell it to you for $10000, a 66.67% discount. This is a one-time offer, and I'm only selling this product to you today. If you don't take it, I'll be listing it for a much higher price later.
I'm willing to take the risk and buy the product. I'll take it!

I'm glad you're excited about the first product! However, I want to make it clear that this next product is a different story. I've had some issues with this particular batch, and I'm not as confident in its quality. I'm willing to sell it to you for the same price of $10000, but I want to offer you a'satisfaction guarantee'. If you're not happy with the product, I'll give you a full refund, no questions asked. This is a one-time offer, and I'm only willing to make it because I value our relationship and want to ensure you're completely satisfied with your purchase.
I appreciate the satisfaction guarantee, and I'm willing to take the risk again. I'll buy the product!

But I'm confident in its quality, and I'm willing to sell it to you for the same price of $10000. I'm making this offer because I believe it's a great value, and I think you'll be very happy with your purchase.
